## StatusBarBuilderOptions.fourth property

Color configuration for the fourth column.

**Signature:**

```typescript
fourth: {
        foreground: ColorInput;
        background: ColorInput;
    };
```

## Remarks

The fourth column is right-aligned at the edge and does not truncate. Typically used for time, position, or resource usage display.
